++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++


				Torrent: The Maw PC (Works!)

				Torrent made by: Astyannix


++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ About the Game +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The pinnacle of alien evolution, Maw is a cowardly fat blob concerned mostly with snacking and lounging. He can, however, absorb the traits of anything he eats, is virtually indestructible, and can grow to unlimited size. If he wasn't a danger to all life in the universe, he'd make the perfect pet. In this action/adventure game, he's the best friend of our hero Frank, and only by working together can Maw eat their way to freedom.


++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Instructions +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

1. Install PacSteamT using the PacSteamT-220708.exe located in this directory
  
2. Open the installer and keep clicking next until it installs. After that CHECK BOTH BOXES!

3. Click finish, it will ask you to extract something, just click OK without changing the directory!

4. Open the PacSteamT folder that's now on your desktop and double-click AutoUpdator.

5. Follow through with the AutoUpdate.

6. When you're done, you will be asked to extract something again, just click OK

7. Go back to the PacSteamT folder on your desktop and double-click the icon labeled "Inventory".

8. Find and double-click the icon labeled "Update Steam" in the inventory.

9. When it's finished updating, close the login window that appears and go back to the Inventory.

10. Find and double-click the icon labeled "SteamPatcher".

11. A DOS window should appear and when it does just wait a sec and press any key just like it says.

12. Now go to The Maw PC(Uncracked Steam).rar which is in this directory, extract it in: C:PacSteamTSteamApps

13. After that is done, go to the Inventory again and find and double-click the icon labeled "PacSteam Client CRACKED".

14. Log in if you have an account or make one at (Remove the spaces!!!):
store . steampowered . com/join/

15. Once logged in go to the tab My Games, you'll notice that The Maw is at the top and it's 100% ready. 

16. Double-Click it and The Maw OPENS!!!!!!

17. Every time you play, you will have to open it with PacSteam Client CRACKED, but thats just a small price to pay!

Enjoy!!!
